item.description:
Craig's Kempo Karate Academy in Watertown is offering our group a free private seminar. Taught by Sensei Craig, this is an anti-bullying and self-defense seminar featuring instruction, role-play, question and answer session as well as last-resort self-defense techniques. This event is for children ages 5 and up and only open to members of this group. Please RSVP to attend. We will need 10 children attending for the class to take place.

I have experienced this class before. It is powerful and important information that they won't teach your child in school.

This seminar is for children ages 5 and up. There is no cost to attend but you must RSVP the number of children attending through this MeetUp.

Saturday, May 1
5pm-7pm
80 School St
Watertown, MA
http://craigskempo.co...
item.name: Anti-Bullying and Self-Defense Seminar
